/* eslint-disable react/no-array-index-key */ import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, Col, Table, } from 'reactstrap'; import DeleteForeverIcon from 'mdi-react/DeleteForeverIcon'; import CartPurchase from './CartPurchase'; import cartList from './cart_list'; const CartCard = () => (
Cart
{cartList.map((ct, i) => ( ))}
# Name Quantity Price Tax Total
{i + 1} {ct.title} {ct.quantity} ${ct.price.toFixed(2)} ${ct.tax.toFixed(2)} ${ct.total.toFixed(2)}
Sub-total: $328.00
 ); export default CartCard;
